content:
# The attempt to move to the nearest iron ore resource was successful. This indicates that my movement commands are still operational, but the underlying issue with player position remains unresolved.

# Given the situation, I will try to place the stone furnace at this new position to see if the placement command works in this context.

furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=current_position())  # Attempt to place the furnace at the current position
print(f'Placed furnace at position: {furnace.position}')  # Confirm the placement of the furnace if successful.
